gw.bizrules.management

Interface RuleQueryFactory<R extends Rule,V extends RuleVersion,H extends RuleHead>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public interface RuleQueryFactory<R extends Rule,V extends RuleVersion,H extends RuleHead>
extends java.io.Serializable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Query<V> createQuery(BizRulesVersionController<R,V,H> controller, FilterCriteria<R> ruleCriteria, FilterCriteria<V> ruleVersionCriteria)
      Generates the query, applying the passed in filters if provided.
      java.lang.String getDisplayName()
      The name to be displayed in the UI for this query

    • Method Detail

      • getDisplayName

        java.lang.String getDisplayName()
        The name to be displayed in the UI for this query
        Returns:
        Display name for query

      • createQuery

        Query<V> createQuery(BizRulesVersionController<R,V,H> controller,
                     FilterCriteria<R> ruleCriteria,
                     FilterCriteria<V> ruleVersionCriteria)
        Generates the query, applying the passed in filters if provided. The returned query should respect the current deployment setting if appropriate.
        Parameters:
        controller - The main controller for BizRules
        ruleCriteria - Vertical filter for the type of rule to match, e.g. which triggering key. Used by the executor to identify which rules apply at a given triggering point.
        ruleVersionCriteria - Horizontal filter for a general rule attribute, such as availableToRun Used by the RulesList UI to apply applicability criteria
        Returns:
        The generated query
